description: Wilson is a big guy, walking into the studio I was a little intimidated “How tall are you?” I asked “6”2”. He replied. Wilson is a beefy looking solo with big ole heart of gold and a guy who likes to wear his heart on his sleeve. “My ex used to call me a big ole teddy bear!” He laughed “Why’s that?” “I’ve always just been the emotional type. I like to watch movies, buy flowers, and make love. You know how treat people right. Wilson started off a bit shy, but once the cameras got rolling he opened up a bit and really got into it. “Will we ever see you back?” I was praying for a yes. “I doubt it, but who knows.” He winked.
title: Wilson
